tool_description: Validates merchant account credentials and retrieves account capabilities and status information.

account_type.description: Type of merchant account (standard, express, custom)

error_messages: Merchant not found: The provided merchant ID does not exist
Account suspended: Merchant account is currently suspended
Invalid account type: Account type must be standard, express, or custom
Verification pending: Account verification is still in progress
usage: Provide merchant_id and account_type to validate merchant account status and retrieve capabilities.
